title: DHS Cuddalore Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline 06 Consultant and Other Posts
description: The District Health Society (DHS) Cuddalore has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 09 Therapeutic, Multi-Purpose Hospital Worker, Consultant, Attender Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass, Any Degree,  D.Pharm, and B.Sc Nursing can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the DHS Cuddalore Recruitment 202...
